title: OrionObject
description: Base schema for all Ontology Objects in the Orion System. Enforces Palantir-style identification and typing.

id.description: Unique Primary Key (UUID or immutable slug). Maps to OSDK $primaryKey.

type.description: The Object Type Name. Maps to OSDK $apiName.

provenance.description: ID of the Agent or Task that created this object (Lineage).

_version.description: Optimistic Concurrency Control Version. Increment on every write.

_locked_by.description: Session ID holding a lock on this object. Null if unlocked.
